entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 then diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
